EmailTemplate.name: 11_26_2015 Happy Turkey Day.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=VMTurbo}}'s Virtual Turkey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
No gimmick today. We're simply writing to wish you and yours a very Happy Thanksgiving. May your day be filled with laughter, fond memories, and an elastic waistband.
- The VMTurbo Team
